title: Kohei Nishino
text:
is a former <a href="Japan">Japan</a>ese <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player. His brother is <a href="Makoto%20Nishino">Makoto Nishino</a>.
He played for Japanese club <a href="Oita%20Trinita">Oita Trinita</a>, <a href="Mito%20HollyHock">Mito HollyHock</a> and <a href="Fagiano%20Okayama">Fagiano Okayama</a>.
